name: Try Tattoo Design Body Ink Art
name_original: Try Tattoo Design Body Ink Art
description:
Have you dreamed of playing amazing fun tattoo games? So prepare yourself for this fun tattoo maker games!
Play as a tattoo artist and make some iconic tattoo. Go and make tattoos from artist. Select tattoo design and make it from your arms, necks. After that take the medicine prescription from tattoo studio. After that go to the pharmacy and get that medicine. Make your tattoo designs and get a job in tattoo studio. Make some stylish tattoo designs and make your customer happy. Be the best tattoo designer of the New York city and make some fabulous tattoo. Enjoy to play as a tattoo artist with unique concept. Come and join to make some stylish tattoo and make your customer happy in this role playing game of Tattoo maker.

**Main Features**
An original and professional Tattoo maker
Several beautiful tattoos to choose from
Wide variety of artist tattoos
Beautiful HD graphics
Easy to play
Free to play forever
